thread.section_title: Hotel Beacon - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Eleventh Anniversary.
thread.title_full: Eleventh Anniversary. - Review of Hotel Beacon, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Shelley N
title: Eleventh Anniversary.
text: We stayed at the Beacon on our honeymoon. And revisited it again. We love this place. Beds are great. Linens were sumptuous. We love Foodways across the street. Parking is right around the corner. Our room was super quiet. Kitchen is perfect. Front desk helped us use public transit. The best breakfast EVER is right next door. Oatmeal to die for. (who knew?). However, alas. After twenty five years of booking here, it may be time to search for less expensive digs. The prices are nuts.
